title: CVBuilder
description: Create your professional CV in a few simple steps

landing.title: Create your professional CV in a few clicks
landing.subtitle: A simple and intuitive tool to create a CV that represents you. Follow our guided steps and get a professional CV in minutes.

features.title: Create your CV in a few simple steps
features.subtitle: Our platform offers everything you need to create a professional CV tailored to European standards.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Start with the basics: your contact details and essential information

education.title: Education
education.description: Highlight your academic background and degrees

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Detail your professional experiences and achievements

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Indicate the languages you master and your level

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: List your technical and professional skills

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Present your personal and professional projects

cta.title: Ready to create your European CV?
cta.subtitle: Join over 1,500 students who have already created their professional CV with our platform.

validation.futureDate: Date cannot be in the future
validation.endDateBeforeStart: End date must be after start date

confirmations.reset: Are you sure you want to reset the form? All data will be lost.
confirmations.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
confirmations.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to leave?

terms.error: You must accept the terms to continue !
terms.english: Warning: Universities require a CV/Resume in English ! If you see this message make sure to leave the website in English.

accountBenefits.modalSubtitle: Create a free account to save it
accountBenefits.inlineDesc: Create a free account to never lose your work
accountBenefits.title: Create a free account
accountBenefits.subtitle: Unlock all features

multipleCvs.title: Multiple CVs
multipleCvs.desc: Create and manage multiple versions of your CV

accessAnywhere.title: Access anywhere
accessAnywhere.desc: Access your CVs from any device

unlimitedEdits.title: Unlimited edits
unlimitedEdits.desc: Come back and edit your CVs anytime

secureData.title: Secure data
secureData.desc: Your data is encrypted and protected

dashboard.title: My CVs
dashboard.noCVsDesc: Start creating your first professional CV in just a few minutes.
dashboard.loginRequiredDesc: Sign in to access your dashboard and manage your CVs.

deleteDialog.title: Delete this CV?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
